title: Sentou Yousei Shoujo Tasukete! Mave-chan
synopsis: Rei goes to an anime convention and ends up in a world created by the desires of anime fans. Rei doesn't know how to get back and the world starts to collapse because the convention is coming to a close.
voices: ['Shimizu, Kaori', 'Mizuki, Nana', 'Yoshino, Hiroyuki', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Nakahara, Mai', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Iwata, Mitsuo']
